TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyGroupDescription extends System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription

summary.span: 描述使用屬性名稱作為準則的項目群組。

span.span: Describes the grouping of items using a property name as the criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視支援的功能的群組，可讓使用者在資料分割成邏輯群組的集合檢視中的集合。Views support the functionality of grouping, which allows the user to partition the collection in the collection view into logical groups. 群組可以是明確的，由使用者提供群組清單，或者是隱含的，讓群組依據資料動態產生。The groups can be explicit, where the user supplies a list of groups, or implicit, where the groups are generated dynamically depending on the data. 可讓您建立隱含為基礎的群組。 allows you to create implicit groups based on a . 如果您只想要分組的屬性可以設定屬性。If you simply want to group by a property you can set the property. 如果您想要變更為最終會使用您可以使用群組值屬性提供值轉換器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，您可能要依據名稱的第一個字母群組項目。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果未設定屬性、 項目本身傳遞至值轉換器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 轉換器可能會傳回集合，這個集合表示項目可以出現在多個群組中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group. 您也可以定義如何比較字串應該採取的地方使用屬性。You can also define how string comparison should take place using the property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定要套用至屬性值或項目的轉換器，以產生用來決定項目所屬群組的最終值。

span.span: Gets or sets a converter to apply to the property value or the item to produce the final value that is used to determine which group(s) an item belongs to.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要變更為最終會使用您可以使用群組值屬性提供值轉換器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，您可能要依據名稱的第一個字母群組項目。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果未設定屬性、 項目本身傳遞至值轉換器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 轉換器可能會傳回集合，這個集合表示項目可以出現在多個群組中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您建立隱含為基礎的群組。 allows you to create implicit groups based on a . 如果您只想要分組的屬性可以設定屬性。If you simply want to group by a property you can set the property. 如果您想要變更為最終會使用您可以使用群組值屬性提供值轉換器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，您可能要依據名稱的第一個字母群組項目。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果未設定屬性、 項目本身傳遞至值轉換器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 轉換器可能會傳回集合，這個集合表示項目可以出現在多個群組中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group. 您也可以定義如何比較字串應該採取的地方使用屬性。You can also define how string comparison should take place using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在比較這兩個值是字串，也會被忽略。This is ignored unless both values in the comparison are strings.
